# Copilot Instructions

<!-- Use this file to provide workspace-specific custom instructions to Copilot. For more details, visit https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/copilot/copilot-customization#_use-a-githubcopilotinstructionsmd-file -->

This is a Next.js barcode generator application with the following features:

## Project Overview
- Beautiful orange-themed UI using Tailwind CSS
- Barcode generation with product details (name, unit, price)
- JSON-based history storage sorted by latest date
- Single-page application with all functionality

## Technical Stack
- Next.js 15 with TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- App Router architecture
- Client-side barcode generation
- Local JSON file for history storage

## Coding Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for type safety
- Follow Next.js App Router conventions
- Use Tailwind CSS for all styling with orange theme colors
- Implement responsive design principles
- Use functional components with React hooks
- Keep all functionality on a single page

## UI/UX Requirements
- Orange color scheme (#f97316, #ea580c, #fb923c, etc.)
- Modern, clean design
- Easy-to-use form interface
- Clear barcode display
- Accessible history list with reuse functionality
